Verify it fades out with an opacity transition over 2s
Verify the notification text is 'Action completed successfully' with font family 'Segoe UI'
Initiate a file upload
Verify the progress bar updates its width from 0% to 75% in 5 seconds
Verify its background color is #28a745, its text 75% is visible, centered, with font size 14px, its height is 20px, and border radius 10px
Verify its label is 'Upload Progress' and its value is 75
Click the date input field
Verify the date picker calendar is visible, positioned directly below the input at x=50px, y=100px
Verify the current month displayed is 'October 2023' with font weight 600
Verify selectable dates have a font color of #333333
Verify today's date has a background color of #007bff with white text
Verify the selected date has a border of 2px solid #0056b3 and a square shape
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify a tooltip becomes visible, positioned at x=200px, y=50px, with width 150px, height 30px, background color #333333, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, opacity 0.9, border radius 3px, padding 5px, and margin 0px
Verify its text is 'Click for assistance'
Click the 'Menu' hamburger icon
Verify the sidebar transitions from hidden to visible, sliding in from the left with an animation duration of 300ms
Verify its width is 250px, height is 100% viewport height, background color #f8f9fa, and border-right is 1px solid #e9ecef
Verify its font color for links is #007bff and font size 16px

Verify the dropzone's border changes from 2px dashed #ccc to 2px dashed #007bff
Verify its background color changes from #f8f8f8 to #e0e7ff
Verify its text 'Drag files here' remains visible and centered, with font size 18px
Verify its height is 150px, width 400px, aria-label 'File upload area', and it has padding 20px
Click the 'Show Password' eye icon in the password input
Verify the input field's type changes from 'password' to 'text'
Verify the 'Show Password' icon's color changes from #6c757d to #007bff
Verify the input's placeholder text is 'Enter your password' and its border is 1px solid #ced4da
Verify the input's value is visible (not hidden by asterisks), its width is 200px, and height 38px
Click the 'Next' arrow on the image carousel
Verify the carousel slides to the next image with a transition effect lasting 500ms
Verify the active image changes its border from 0px to 2px solid #007bff
Verify the image count displayed updates from '1 of 5' to '2 of 5'
Verify the 'Previous' arrow becomes enabled with opacity 1
Verify the current image source is 'image_02.jpg' and its alt text is 'Second slide image'
Click the '+' (Zoom In) button on the map
Verify the map view zooms in, increasing the displayed area's scale
